author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify the debug statements to enable the testing of the crash in the Digi step for 34034.0

#### PR validation:

Use the debug statements in trying to locate the cause of the segmentation violation

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx363E Modify the debug statements to enable the testing of the crash in the Digi step for 34034.0
